posts.post_content:
Hey guess what tribe has the same word in all their names- slivers! All 77 of them. Combine with your favorite reanimation engine and hey presto, instadeck.  
  
Granted sliver decks are probably too proud to use an un- card.

posts.post_content:
@ allmighty\_abacus  
  
Being an un-card aside, there are two reasons why slivers wouldn't run this card. First, [Harmonic Sliver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Harmonic Sliver) would destroy it. Second, the effect can be achieved by [Homing Sliver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Homing Sliver) and [Sliver Overlord](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sliver Overlord). Doesn't have much to do with pride.
posts.html:
@ allmighty_abacus

Being an un-card aside, there are two reasons why slivers wouldn't run this card. First, Harmonic Sliver would destroy it. Second, the effect can be achieved by Homing Sliver and Sliver Overlord. Doesn't have much to do with pride.
